name: Amodius
description:
Amodius is a casual tile tapping game. The idea behind the Amodius tiles revolves around each tile being possessed by a memory or being of another existence. You must tap the tiles once they become possessed to exorcise them.

FEATURES:
-Alternate Games
-Two Arcade Modes
